instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, touch and hold the Home button or say "Ok Google." In the bottom right, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial and then Settings. Tap Services and then Music . Choose a music service. For some services, you ll be asked to sign in to your account.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Home app . At the bottom, tap Home and then Settings . Under "Google Assistant services," tap Music . Choose a music service. For some services, you ll be asked to sign in to your account.
